body_html:
Have I written custom code: No
Source scripts: https://github.com/tensorflow/benchmarks/tree/master/scripts/tf_cnn_benchmarks
Exact command to reproduce: ./tf_cnn_benchmarks/tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --model resnet50 --batch_size 64 --num_batches 50000 --data_format=NCHW --local_parameter_device gpu --data_dir=/usr/imagenet
OS Platform and Distribution: Ubuntu 16.04 (64bit)
TensorFlow installed from: pip3 install tensorflow-gpu==1.4.2
TensorFlow version: 1.4.2
Bazel version: pre-built from pip
CUDA/cuDNN version: CUDA8 + CUDNN6
GPU model and memory: Tesla P100 (x4GPU, each 16GMem) + NVlink

body:
**Have I written custom code:** No
**Source scripts:** https://github.com/tensorflow/benchmarks/tree/master/scripts/tf_cnn_benchmarks
**Exact command to reproduce:** `./tf_cnn_benchmarks/tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --model resnet50 --batch_size 64 --num_batches 50000 --data_format=NCHW --local_parameter_device gpu --data_dir=/usr/imagenet`
**OS Platform and Distribution:** Ubuntu 16.04 (64bit)
**TensorFlow installed from:** pip3 install tensorflow-gpu==1.4.2
**TensorFlow version:** 1.4.2
**Bazel version:** pre-built from pip
**CUDA/cuDNN version**: CUDA8 + CUDNN6
**GPU model and memory:** Tesla P100 (x4GPU, each 16GMem) + NVlink
